text: The Bipartisan Policy Center (BPC) is a Washington, D.C.â€“based think tank that promotes bipartisanship. The organization wants to combine ideas from both the Republican and Democratic parties to fix challenges in the United States. BPC was founded in 2007 by former Senate Majority Leaders Howard Baker, Tom Daschle, Bob Dole, and George J. Mitchell. As of 2021, the founding and current president is Jason Grumet. ==References== Category:Think tanks based in the United States Category:Organizations in Washington, D.C.
